with the pope' s , Spain and Portugal had divided the non-Christian world and , in 1494 , established a line about 1,100 miles west the Azores .在教皇的允准下，西班牙和葡萄牙已把非基督教世界划分完毕。1494年，在阿索尔以西约1100英里处确定了一条分界线。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, via ecclesiastical Latin from ecclesiastical Greek papas 'bishop, patriarch', variant of Greek pappas 'father'
mid 17th cent.: from Russian pop, from Old Church Slavonic popǔ
